column1: Lists changeable, tuples not. Lists [], tuples (). Tuples faster.
Python needs indentation to group code, otherwise error.
Numbers, strings, lists, dicts, sets, and bools.
Python clears unused memory with garbage collection.
Decorators modify function without changing code. Use @.
Shallow copy shares inner objects, deep copy does not.
Modules are files, packages are folders with __init__.py.
GIL stops more than one thread from running Python.
Use try-except to catch errors and avoid breaking code.
Initializes variables in a class when an object is made.
Type `python -m venv envname` to create a venv.
